title: Hamed Aghaei
text:
Hamed Aghaei () is an Iranian <a href="association%20football">football</a> <a href="Forward%20%28association%20football%29">forward</a>, who currently plays for Iranian football club <a href="Oxin%20Alborz%20F.C.">Oxin Alborz</a> in the <a href="Azadegan%20League">Azadegan League</a>. He can also play in both centre back and left back positions.
Club career.
Persepolis F.C..
Aghaei joined <a href="Persepolis%20F.C.">Persepolis</a> in summer 2016 with a contract until 2019.
Naft Tehran.
Aghaei Loand <a href="Naft%20Tehran%20F.C.">Naft Tehran</a> until end season.
